Name: Christmas Tale - Visual Novel
About the game: Christmas tale - it's a short choice-based visual novel about two days before Christmas. You will decide which choice to make, hoping it somehow will change your life. - Christmas atmosphere - Three endings - Steam Achievements DLC Deluxe Edition includes Winter Relax mode and Wallpapers.
